name: Rush to your date! Procrastination get out of the way!
name_original: Rush to your date! Procrastination get out of the way!
description:
You met someone online and have arranged to meet at the local restaurant for a date! You lost track of time and you need to get there now! Don't let anything distract you!

Move with the WASD or Arrow keys. To interact just move onto the item.
There are 20 'endings' in the game. How many will you find?

Thank you for taking a look at my first game.

List of endings (in no particular order):
1.    Perfect Date END 
2.    Good Date END
3.    Bad Date END
4.    Bad Beer END
5.    Better Beer END
6.    TV END
7.    BED END
8.    Game END 
9.    Lazy END
10. Strange END
11. Eco END
12. Lost END
13. Early Date END
14. Power Flower Date END
15. Sheild Flower Date END
16. Magic Flower Date END
17. DEAD END
18. Enlightened END
19. Stuck in the hole END
20. Prehistoric END

Hints:
- You need to feed the cat then head straight into the restaurant to get the Perfect Date END                                  
- Try Interacting with the same thing more than once!
- Remember to grab the key to leave! Or not?
- For a slightly better Beer End, try heading to the toilet first...
- There is another path, at the very left of the restaurant entrance!
-  Keep talking to the chair
-  It isn't worth getting the batteries, it warps you back to the normal restaurant 
-  There is a path below the park where you can obtain special 'flowers'
-Try giving the flowers to everyone (Past and Present) in the restaurant (except your actual date)
